net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class CmsContextFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.CmsContextFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter, InitializingBean

    public class CmsContextFilter
extends Object
implements Filter, InitializingBean
    Filter that sets up the Cms Contexts. This is needed for integration with other servlets that may interact with CMS.

    This needs to be configured after the HibernateSessionHandler filter for CMS.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
